title: Jumped on the spce wagon at their peak

replies.msg:
Jumped on the SPCE wagon at their peak. Now dropped considerably. I'm questioning now that I didn't do enough research which is my own fault (although a market crash for corona virus didn't help) . I'm questioning whether to dollar cost average my investment and buy more whilst it's low or just leave it (not interested in selling).
I can't help but think though that it's the only business of its kind with hude potential in the future. Space travel I'm guessing could be common place for our grandkids.
Anyone else in a similar position?
